column6: When a highly-classified secret threatens Captain America, only the newly-returned Nick Fury has the tools to bring the mysterious figure down! Project Avengers is a go!
column8: | other:Chris Eliopoulos | colorist:Laura Martin | colorist:Justin Ponsor | inker:Danny K. Miki | writer:Mark Millar | penciller:Carlos Pacheco | letterer:Cory Petit
